tasks.title: Integrate BreathingAnimation Component into Dynamic Flow

tasks.details: Import and integrate the BreathingAnimation component from `/components/checkin/BreathingAnimation.tsx` into the BreathingStep within CheckInFlowRenderer.tsx. Ensure the component maintains its multi-circle expanding animation, 'Breathe in'/'Breathe out' text, single cycle timing (5s inhale, 5s exhale), and proper dark mode support. tasks.title: Validate Complete Integration and Session Data Flow

tasks.details: Conduct end-to-end testing of the complete morning check-in flow to ensure all integrated components work together properly.
